message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you, and I'm willing to part with it for $20,000.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your offer, Bob, but $12,000 is too low for me.  How about we meet halfway between our two offers at $16,000?
I'm not sure I can go up to $16,000. How about $14,000? I really think that's the most I can afford.
